attributes.action: place a ban on Tesco opening any more stores in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enough is enough.  It seems like every time I drive through my home town (or anywhere else in the country) yet another Tesco store has opened. From huge mega-stores to small convenience stores and garages, the disease that is Tesco is spreading throughout our country.  I'm all for a bit of healthy competition but fear it is getting out of hand.  What will it be next I wonder, Tesco hospitals? Tesco schools? 
Surely the billions Tesco already make is sufficent to keep them in business and keep the staff they already have in full employment.  Just don't let them get any bigger.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
